app.name: MinimaLauncher
app.long_description:
MinimaLauncher boots whatever disc is in the slot for Wii or Gamecube. Built in gameconfig.txt for Brawl and Kirby (SUKE01). Supports Cheats in SD:/codes/ Supports Gameconfig in SD:/gameconfig.txt
Copyright (C) 2012-2014 FIX94 Credit to tueidj for vWii Widescreen Patch! Credit to crediar for kirby's gameconfig
